In January , Special - Purpose Marine Air - Ground Task Force Crisis Response evacuated the U.S. Embassy in Juba , South Sudan , using the Super Hercules .

The Morón , Spain-based unit flew from Spain to Djibouti before punching onward to South Sudan where they pulled more than 20 embassy personnel out of the country amid violence between factions on the brink of civil war .
